Criterion Text In: Provision of signed and dated informed consent form
Criterion Text Out: Provision of signed and dated informed consent form

Criterion Text In: Stated willingness to comply with all study procedures and availability for the duration of the study
Criterion Text Out: Stated willingness to comply with all study procedures and availability for the duration of the study
Criterion Rule: "Stated willingness to comply with all study procedures" AND "Availability for the duration of the study" is True

Criterion Text In: Male patients aged 18 years and older
Criterion Text Out: Male patients aged 18 years and older

Criterion Text In: In good general health as evidenced by medical history to be a candidate for curative-intent prostate cancer treatment
Criterion Text Out: In good general health as evidenced by medical history to be a candidate for curative-intent prostate cancer treatment
Criterion Rule: "In good general health as evidenced by medical history to be a candidate for curative-intent prostate cancer treatment" is True

Criterion Text In: Ability to receive pelvic radiotherapy and be willing to adhere to the SUPR-SABR regimen
Criterion Text Out: Ability to receive pelvic radiotherapy and be willing to adhere to the SUPR-SABR regimen
Criterion Rule: "Pelvic Radiotherapy" is True and "Willingness to Adhere to the SUPR-SABR Regimen" is True

Criterion Text In: Previously untreated prostate cancer (with cytotoxic chemotherapy, cryotherapy, surgical or radiation therapy)
Criterion Text Out: Previously untreated prostate cancer (with cytotoxic chemotherapy, cryotherapy, surgical or radiation therapy)
Procedure: Cytotoxic Chemotherapy, Cryotherapy, Surgical or Radiation Therapy
Criterion Rule: "Previously untreated prostate cancer (with cytotoxic chemotherapy, cryotherapy, surgical or radiation therapy)" is False

Criterion Text In:
Localized adenocarcinoma of the prostate with the following features
* cT1-T2c
* Prostate specific antigen (PSA) < 20
** Patients receiving a 5-alpha reductase inhibitor must have a PSA < 10
* Grade group 1-3
* Lymph node negative
* Negative for distant metastases
Criterion Text Out: Localized adenocarcinoma of the prostate with the following features
Criterion Rule: "Localized adenocarcinoma of the prostate with the following features" is True

Criterion Text In: History and physical including a digital rectal exam 90 days prior to registration
Criterion Text Out: History and physical including a digital rectal exam 90 days prior to registration
Criterion Rule: "History and physical including a digital rectal exam 90 days prior to registration" is True

Criterion Text In: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status 0-2
Criterion Text Out: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status 0-2

Criterion Text In: Be able to undergo MRI prostate and pelvis as a component of radiation therapy (RT) planning
Criterion Text Out: Be able to undergo MRI prostate and pelvis as a component of radiation therapy (RT) planning

Criterion Text In: Bone and soft tissue imaging as clinically indicated (for unfavorable intermediate risk or symptomatic patients only) within 120 days prior to registration
Criterion Text Out: Bone and soft tissue imaging as clinically indicated (for unfavorable intermediate risk or symptomatic patients only) within 120 days prior to registration
Criterion Rule: "Imaging" is True AND ("unfavorable intermediate risk" OR "symptomatic") is False

Criterion Text In: International Prostate Symptom Score (IPSS) score =< 20 at time of initial history and physical with treating radiation oncologist
Criterion Text Out: International Prostate Symptom Score (IPSS) score =< 20 at time of initial history and physical with treating radiation oncologist
Criterion Rule: "IPSS score < 20 at time of initial history and physical with treating radiation oncologist" is True

Criterion Text In: Concurrent use of testosterone supplementation as it is contraindicated during prostate cancer treatment
Criterion Text Out: Concurrent use of testosterone supplementation as it is contraindicated during prostate cancer treatment

Criterion Text In: Known homozygous for ATM pathogenic mutation
Criterion Text Out: known homozygous for ATM pathogenic mutation

Criterion Text In: Pre-existing conditions or overall health status which disqualifies the patient from curative- intent RT. Patients with life expectancy less than 10 years are not eligible
Criterion Text Out: Pre-existing conditions or overall health status which disqualifies the patient from curative-intent RT. Patients with life expectancy less than 10 years are not eligible
Criterion Rule: "Pre-existing conditions or overall health status which disqualifies the patient from curative-intent RT. Patients with life expectancy less than 10 years are not eligible" is False

Criterion Text In: Prior or concurrent invasive pelvic malignancy (except non-melanomatous skin cancer) or lymphomatous or hematogenous malignancy, unless disease free for a minimum of 5 years
Criterion Text Out: Prior or concurrent invasive pelvic malignancy (except non-melanomatous skin cancer) or lymphomatous or hematogenous malignancy, unless disease free for a minimum of 5 years
Disease: Invasive Pelvic Malignancy, Lymphomatous Malignancy, Hematogenous Malignancy
Criterion Rule: LK PELVIC == True OR LK LYMPHOMA == True OR LK HEMATOGENOUS == True AND NOT LK FREE_FOR_5_YEARS == True

Criterion Text In: Prior prostatectomy, cryotherapy, high-intensity focused ultrasound directed towards the prostate for any prostate disease or condition
Criterion Text Out: Prior prostatectomy, cryotherapy, high-intensity focused ultrasound directed towards the prostate for any prostate disease or condition
Procedure: Prostatectomy, Cryotherapy, High Intensity Focused Ultrasound
Criterion Rule: "Prostate" AND ("Prostatectomy" OR "Cryotherapy" OR "High Intensity Focused Ultrasound")
